title: I know police presence on bicycles is noticed mostly in downtown Wilmington. But, what about other areas such as busy retail outlets? Property crimes are up significantly according to recent reports.
text:
Because of the proximity from the station to downtown, police
officers there on bicycles make sense. One would guess that having
them patrol busy retail outlets would make sense, but MyReporter
isn't able to change their patrol routes. Your best option is to
contact your local police station and ask to have areas of control
patrolled. The more residents speak out about a particular area, the
more likely police will respond accordingly.
